item.title: About
item.description: We are the Python community on Matrix, a free and open network for secure, decentralized communication. The Moderation Team Name Matrix Username BrenBarn @brenbarn:matrix.org ilex @ilex:oakforest.in James Belchamber @jamesbelchamber:matrix.org Michael Sasser @michael:michaelsasser.org You can click on the moderator’s “Name”, in the table above, if you want to know more about that person. The Abuse Management bot has it’s own page too!
